message: Okay! So there is a different standard of dress for girls and boys in the mosque in accordance to this """"religion""""! If it was a Christian church requiring girls to dress differently we would hear nothing but outrage from the left, with cries of sexism, war on women, double standards, separation of church and state ad nauseaum! message: Only if green energy replaces most oil. None of those countries have anything else to base their economy on. If oil becomes as obsolete as coal then maybe they could go bankrupt but so would everyone else in the region except Israel. Airplanes are a long way from becoming battery powered. Oil will still be necessary for a lot of plastics and resins. The Saud family owns lots of stock all over the world including part of Fox news.
